text:
Casechek | http://casechek.com | Chicago / Local | Backend Developer - PHP

We are looking for a backend developer to join our engineering team. We are an early stage healthcare startup with a nice customer base and lots of interesting projects and problems to solve. Casechek is located in the West Loop neighborhood of Chicago and we are looking for local developers.

If you are a backend developer in Chicago and are interested in working with an early stage startup check out our post => http://www.casechek.com/careers#backend_developer_post

Thanks!
